hero.title: Get Expert Answers You Can Trust, Instantly
hero.subtitle: Saras AI delivers grounded, regulation-compliant insights without hallucinations. It's the tireless, always-on assistant your finance, tax, and legal teams have always needed—ready to provide accurate answers and actionable intelligence, anytime.

features.title: An AI Built for Professionals
features.subtitle: More than a chatbot—Saras is a deep, domain-trained knowledge engine built for critical thinking and compliance.

items.title: Zero Hallucination
items.description: Powered by verified corpora of tax laws, regulatory frameworks, case laws, and accounting standards, Saras provides responses backed by source logic—not assumptions or guesses.

items.title: Purpose-Built for Professionals
items.description: Understands the language of finance, tax, and law. From Section 43B disallowances to IND AS 115 compliance or FEMA advisory—Saras speaks your language and aligns with your workflows.

items.title: Customizable Intelligence Engine
items.description: Fine-tune Saras to follow your internal policies, document formats, advisory tone, or jurisdiction-specific practices. It learns your preferences and grows with your organization.

items.title: Instant Scenario Evaluation
items.description: Ask multi-layered queries like: 'What are the GST implications for an inter-unit service transaction under SEZ rules?' Saras breaks it down and responds like a seasoned expert—fast.

items.title: Standardized Formats
items.description: Get responses in draft memo, summary note, opinion format, computation table, or even Board presentation structure—based on how your team typically works.

detailSection.title: Contextualized for Your Business
detailSection.description: Unlike generic chatbots, Saras is trained on structured and verified content across tax codes, legal commentary, audit handbooks, and financial templates. When you ask a question, it evaluates your query not just by keywords, but by interpreting your business function, jurisdiction, and objective. Whether you're drafting a GST refund note or seeking clarity on a board resolution, Saras responds in the exact format your professionals expect—complete with references, logic, and compliance citations.

cta.title: In Your World, There's No Room for Error.
cta.subtitle: Equip your teams with an AI that's purpose-built for professionals in high-stakes, regulation-heavy environments. Saras delivers reliability, precision, and speed—so your decisions are always backed by trusted knowledge.
